Package org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.charts

Class DescriptionLabel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.charts.AbstractMeterElement
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.charts.DescriptionLabel
  • public final class DescriptionLabel
extends AbstractMeterElement
    Meter element class to define the description to render in the meter chart under the ValueLabel.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
